question: Tumhe kis type ka kaam pasand hai?
options: Logon se baat karna ya samasya suljhane mein madad karna
Naye cheezein banana ya likhna ya design karna
Data analyse karna ya technical systems samajhna
Apna kaam khud plan karna ya business karna

question: Tumhare interest kisme jyada hai?
options: Art, music, dance, acting ya creative field

question: Tumhe kis environment me kaam karna accha lagta hai?
options: Formal office jahan fixed schedule ho
Flexible timing aur creative freedom ho
Public dealing aur logon ke saath kaam
